titles.title: Department of Defense Managed Print Services Utilization Act of 2017
Department of Defense Managed Print Services Utilization Act of 2017
To require the Department of Defense to utilize managed print services.
Department of Defense Managed Print Services Utilization Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Department of Defense Managed Print Services Utilization Act of 2017
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to pursue managed print services within DOD.
